sentence.text: Steady state plasma digitoxin concentrations did not appear to change.
sentence.negationtags: Steady state plasma digitoxin concentrations did <scope> <cue> not appear </cue> to change. </scope>

sentence.text: Therefore, monitoring of plasma digoxin levels may be indicated in patients receiving similar combination chemotherapy regimens.
The utilization of digitoxin for such patients may be considered as an alternative.
